listen to me, you fucking morons who scream VIRUS at the least little thing:
There is no firus, shut the fuck up.
Here is how to get the game to work:
Mount the ISO using Alcohol 120. Just do it, your computer can't tell the diff between an alcohol drive and a real one, some other tools can't claim the same.
Install the game. When it asks you for the CD key, use the keygen.
Copy and paste the key codes generated by it.
Continue to install.
When fully installed, create another virtual drive with alcohol.
Then mount the ISO that's within the other ISO onto the new drive. Trust me, nothing will crash, maybe lag a little, but no crash.
install RoE.
Fuck the patched EXE file, it's not worth the game crashes, you can play just fine offline now.
To play online, BUY THE FUCKING GAME YOU PIG.

WINDOWS VISTA AND 7 RESOLUTION FIX

Note: If you know your computer can't run Doom 3 at a higher resolution then don't bother trying this.

Go to - Computer > Local disk > Programe Files > Doom 3 > base

Or just copy and Past this [ C:\Program Files\DOOM 3\base ] in your windows explorer search bar

Look for 'DoomConfig.cfg' and use the 'Open With...' right click command, select NotePad from the list.

Inside the document find these lines:

seta r_customHeight "xxx"
seta r_customWidth "xxxx"

Change the x's to set your resolution. 

Now find this line:

seta r_mode "x"

Change the "x" to "-1".
Find this line:

seta r_aspectRatio "x"

If your screen aspect ratio is 16:9, change the "x" to "1".
If your screen aspect ratio is 16:10 or 15:9, change the "x" to "2".

As with any .ini solution, if you cannot find any of these lines in your DoomConfig.cfg file, just add them in manually. 

Note: You might want to teak the mouse as well

WINDOWS VISTA AND 7 RESOLUTION FIX

Note: If you know your computer can't run Doom 3 at your screens resolution then don't bother trying this.

Go to - Computer > Local disk > Programe Files > Doom 3 > base

Or just copy and Past this [ C:\Program Files\DOOM 3\base ] in your windows explorer search bar

Look for 'DoomConfig.cfg' and use the 'Open With...' right click command, select NotePad from the list.

Inside the document find these lines:

seta r_customHeight "xxx"
seta r_customWidth "xxxx"

Change the x's to set your resolution.

Now find this line:

seta r_mode "x"

Change the "x" to "-1".
Find this line:

seta r_aspectRatio "x"

If your screen aspect ratio is 16:9, change the "x" to "1".
If your screen aspect ratio is 16:10 or 15:9, change the "x" to "2".

upon clicking the [x] close button on the upper right, notepad prompts you to save click save then take Doom 3 for a spin.

Same basic principle for Doom 3 Resurrection of Evil

As with any .ini solution, if you cannot find any of these lines in your DoomConfig.cfg file, just add them in manually.

Note: You might want to teak the mouse as well

For this of you who are having Trouble. Here is what you do.

1) Download the Torrent via(utorrent client, Vuze, whatever)
2) Download Daemons lite
3) Double Click the iso and let it launch
4) Click Open Folder to View Files
5) Click Setup.exe
6) Install doom 3, For CD key go to folder extras and "Doom 3 & crack" 
7) Click Keygen and generate CD-KEY
8 ) Copy that key and install doom 3
9) After installation is done go back to view files and go to doom 3 resurrection of evil and copy the iso to desktop. 
10) Launch iso and install away. For doom 3 ROE cd key go doom 3 ROE serial keys wordpad file
11) copy the cd key to install doom 3 ROE(It will install doom 3 1.2 update automatically)
12) after installation is complete download doom 3 1.3.1 update from gamefront or filefront since the update is not package with the game. Then install that update.
13) Lastly go to http://www.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_doom_3.shtml and click "Doom 3 / Doom 3: Resurrection of Evil v1.3.1 [ENGLISH] Win98 Fixed EXE" and download
14) Extract crack folder to desktop and copy doom 3.exe crack into doom 3 game installation such as C:Program Files x86doom 3 for example. Then paste and launch away. Thanks Driss_Himdi! ;D
